get.summary: Links to the API's resources

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns an association identified by the given UUID

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the requested association

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns all available associations.
get.description: Returns all available association as a paged list. The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Filter for association using the given UUID. Defaults to no filtering.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns the list of committees.
get.description: Returns the list of committees for an association as a paged list. The default page size is The returned committees list their respective members including the members' publicly available contact information.20. The page size must not be greater than 100

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the association whose committees are requested

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.description: Returns the list of sportsclubs belonging to the association identified by the specified UUID as a paged list. The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100

parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: uuid

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns the list of available committees as a paged list.
get.description: Returns all committees belonging to the association which can be accessed with the used API key. The returned committees list their respective members including the members' publicly available contact information. The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns a committee identified by the given UUID
get.description: Returns the requested committee if it belongs to the association which can be accessed with the used API key. The returned committee lists its respective members including the members' publicly available contact information.

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

get.summary: Returns all available league hierarchy elements as a paged list.
get.description: The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100. The result list can be filtered for a particular season.

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

parameters.name: for-season
parameters.description: Filter for the season. UUID of the season to which the league hierarchy belongs.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Filter for association using the given UUID. Defaults to no filtering.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns all available competition matches as a paged list.
get.description: The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100. The result list can be filtered for a particular season, competition, sports club, or team by passing the UUID of the entity for which to filter as a filter query parameter. The filters will be combined with AND semantics.

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Filter for association using the given UUID. Defaults to no filtering.

parameters.name: for-season
parameters.description: Filter by season UUID: Find all matches from a particular season.

parameters.name: for-competition
parameters.description: Filter by competition UUID: Find all matches from a particular competition.

parameters.name: for-sportsclub
parameters.description: Filter by sports club UUID: Find all matches for a particular sports club.

parameters.name: for-team
parameters.description: Filter by team UUID: Find all matches attended by a particular team.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

get.summary: Returns all league hierarchies corresponding to the season identified by the given UUID

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

get.summary: Returns all available sports clubs.
get.description: The default page size is 20. The page size must not be greater than 100

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Requested page number. Defaults to the first page (i.e. page number 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Requested number of items per page. Defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value is 100

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Filter for association using the given UUID. Defaults to no filtering.

get.summary: Provides links to sub resources

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: A SAMS API key with permission to access this API.

400.description: POST only: A violation occurred while validating the processed request data, for example caused by an invalid email address. Check the response for further details.

409.description: The request could not be processed due to invalid request data. Check the response for more details.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support and supply the response data.

level.description: Zero-based hierarchy level for the association. For top-level associations, the level is 0.

Address.description: Address for a location or a person. An address object may be null if no address data is available. For persons this might be the case if the address visibility has been set to private.

associationUuid.description: Reference to the association this entity belongs to

CommitteeMember.description: A member of a committee. Personal data may be null if its visibility has been restricted.

superCompetitionUuid.description: If this competition is the sub-competition of a super competition then this UUID points to this super competition.
If this competition is the sub-competition of a super competition then this UUID points to this super competition.

Location.description: A location comprises the location's name, its address, and its geographical coordinates if available

dateNotYetKnown.description: True if no start and end date has been set yet

beginsAt.description: Start date for an event. Is null if dateNotYetKnown is true

canceled.description: True if the event has been canceled

usedCapacity.description: Number of registered participants for an event. If this event is a subordinate event, i.e. there is a higher level event, then this value is calculated as the sum of all participants of the higher level event and all participants of this higher level event's subordinate event. If this event has subordinate events, then this value is calculated as the sum of participants of this event and all its subordinate events.

eventTypeUuid.description: Reference to the type details for this event
